title: Github - Explorer
description: A web app to explore GitHub repositories, search by keywords, and view detailed information, all in one intuitive interface.

title: Unit Converter
description: A unit converter app that allows users to convert between different units of measurement, such as length, weight, volume, and temperature.

title: Tic-Tac-Toe Game
description: Aclassic Tic Tac Toe game where players take turns placing their X or O marks on a 3x3 grid until one player wins or the game ends in a draw.
